Note: Although the standard glasses are the smallest size we have, they are still too big for the participant.
The participant took 3:45 min set up the glasses to the phone and an extra 56 seconds to set up meta band.

Issue: In the beginning of the study, there was a point were the participants was playing hyper-trail. And the gestures were not registering due to a hovering gesture instead of making actual contract to between thumb and pointer finger. 

Fix: To fix the issue participant was to to make
The fact that the display is on one side and not the other seemed to be a little strange for the participant.
While playing hypertrail participant had to be looking at a dark background in order to properly see the display.
There is very minimal amount of fixing the position of the glasses.
There is a bit of one eyed squinting when looking at the display.
During the video call there is not issues. The sound quality was great as well as the video quality.
As more time goes on there seems to be more times participant has to adjust the glasses due to slipping.
